title: Seoul Medical CRM Design
subtitle: How we developed a centralized healthcare platform that integrates financial tracking, project management, and patient task mseoultoring, resulting in more efficient clinic operations and streamlined administrative workflows.

about.name: Seoul Medical CRM
about.desc: Seoul Medical CRM is a platform provides a comprehensive user management system, enabling hospital administrators to keep track of team roles, responsibilities, and project assignments efficiently.

projectTeam.desc: The team consisted of two UI designers and one UX designer along with the project owner. The entire project was completed in 4 weeks.
members: Project Management and UX Design - Vanshita

projectDetails_1.heading: What was the Problem?
projectDetails_1.desc:
• Managing a clinic's finances and operations and projects can be overwhelming, with multiple moving parts such as tracking and mseoultoring expenses, and ensuring patient-related tasks are completed.
  • The client wanted a centralized system to provide real-time insights, enabling clinic administrators to efficiently manage projects, patients, forms, and analytics all in one place.

projectDetails_1.heading: What were the Goals?
projectDetails_1.desc:
To build a centralised platform healthcare platfrom that :

  • Simplifies user management with role-based filters, project assignments.
  • Provides a real-time financial dashboard for tracking sales, expenses, and refunds, while streamlining patient task management and consolidating key data for quick, informed decision-making

projectDetails_1.heading: What was the Solution?
projectDetails_1.desc:
Key Solutions Delivered:

  • Dashboard: Central hub for financial and personal metrics, including sales, expenses, refunds, and task completion.
  • Chat: Real-time messaging for team collaboration and updates.
  • Projects: Manage clinic projects, tasks, and progress tracking.
  • Procedure Pricing: Manage and update pricing for clinic procedures.
  • Forms: Create, store, and manage forms filled by the patients for inquiries
  • User Management: Handle user roles, permissions, and task assignments.
  • Admin Settings: Control panel for platform configuration and system customization.

projectDetails_2.heading: Behind the Scenes...
projectDetails_2.desc:
Understanding Client Requirements:

The client provided a basic structure of required features, which we used as a foundation to build user flows and organize data points systematically.



Research & Inspiration

To align with the client’s vision, we studied similar platforms, particularly Asana by Atlassian, to understand how user management systems function effectively.



Iterative Design Approach:

Using the research insights and client feedback, we designed and refined the platform to ensure it was comprehensive, user-friendly, and met all requirements seamlessly.

projectDetails_2.heading: User Interface and Product Outlook
projectDetails_2.desc:
• The user interface features a clean, professional design with a predominantly olive gold and white color scheme, using the “Noto Sans KR” typeface for typography.
  • A structured grid layout organizes charts and cards effectively, while the sidebar navigation and intuitive filters enhance the user’s understanding of the information.
  • Circular charts and data visualizations simplify complex information, while the clean, readable design ensures usability and adaptability across various screen sizes.

projectDetails_3.heading: Conclusion
projectDetails_3.desc:
What did we achieve from the project ?

  • We created a centralized platform that integrates financial tracking, project management, and patient task monitoring, making clinic operations more efficient and organized.
  • The platform's clean design, intuitive navigation, and role-based features ensure ease of use, enabling clinic administrators to manage complex workflows effortlessly.

projectDetails_3.heading: Client Feedback
projectDetails_3.desc:
What did we achieve from the project ?

  • Re-designed the entire seoul app with a fresh outlook of minimalist and simpler user interface.
  • The new design improves usability and enhances seoul’s image as a reliable platform for connecting users with contractors and suppliers.
